buildCommand: mkdir -p node_modules/@empty/swisseph && echo '{"name":"@empty/swisseph","version":"1.0.0","main":"index.js"}' > node_modules/@empty/swisseph/package.json && echo 'module.exports={swe_julday:()=>0,swe_calc_ut:()=>0,swe_revjul:()=>{},swe_close:()=>{},swe_set_ephe_path:()=>{},SE_GREG_CAL:1};' > node_modules/@empty/swisseph/index.js && npm install --no-optional --ignore-scripts && npm run vercel-build
